Footer.about: <bold>About this website:</bold> built with Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, React Email & Resend, Vercel hosting.

IntroSection.intro: <bold>Hello, I'm Vu Ngo.</bold> I'm a junior <bold>full-stack developer</bold> with <bold>2 years</bold> of experience. I enjoy building <italic>sites & apps</italic>.

AboutSection.heading: About me
AboutSection.aboutMe: I recently graduated with a bachelor degree in <medium>Computer Science</medium> with knowledge in programming languages, databases, and web development. <underline>Experience in maintenance and support environment</underline>, working on solving system bugs. <underline>Ability to solve problems and fast learner</underline>. Currently, I have been studying and developing <medium>Full-stack projects</medium> with various technologies such as <medium>React, Next.js, Typescript, and Tailwind</medium>. I am currently looking for a <medium>full-time position</medium> as a software developer.
AboutSection.hobbies: <italic>When I'm not coding</italic>, I enjoy playing video games, watching movies, and reading. I also enjoy <bold>cooking</bold>. Currently, my main dishes are <bold>pizzas and a great barbecue</bold>. I also like to go to the gym to stay healthy.

ContactSection.heading: Contact me
ContactSection.description: Please contact me directly at <link>ngoanhvu110293@gmail.com</link> or through this form.
